name: creditable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
deserving praise, trust, or respect: Our team came in a creditable third in the competition. The other, less creditable, reason for their decision was personal gain.

Add to word list
Add to word list
FINANCE, HR used to describe a period of time that someone has worked, which is used to calculate their pension (= payments when they stop work): She has 30 years of creditable service.
